summary: THE TRANSMISSION JUMPS,JERKS ...WHEN I START TO LEAVE AN AREA.FEELS LIKE THE TRANSMISSION IS SLIPPING.!!. WHEN I START THE CAR TO LEAVE MY DRIVEWAY OR EVERYTIME I LEAVE AN AREA,ALSO AT RED LIGHTS,ETC. ITS BEEN THIS WAY EVERY SINCE I BOUGHT IT BUT GILLIE HYDE SERVICE DEPT (WHERE I BOUGHT THE CAR )SAID IT WAS NORMAL WHEN I TOOK IT BACK.ALLTHOUGH I STILL HAVE THE CAR.VERY DISAPPOINTED WITH THIS ISSUE
